Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Officer cited credibility concerns due to contradictions in employment certificates
Crimes.Evidence_Type: Employment certificates, evidence of cooking skills
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Alleged misrepresentation and insufficient proof of job qualifications
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Lack of clear reasoning connecting evidence to conclusion
Crimes.Application_Error: Failure to provide intelligible reasons for refusal
Crimes.Evidence_Ignored: Insufficient explanation on how contradictory documents affected credibility
Crimes.Decision_Review_Issue: Adequacy and clarity of reasons provided
Crimes.Outcome_of_Review: Judicial review allowed; case remanded for redetermination
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Credibility issues and insufficient evidence of required job skills
Crimes.Evidentiary_Issues: Contradictions in employment certificates, lack of proof of cooking skills
Crimes.Credibility_Issues: Found in employment history and skill claims
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Failure to meet procedural fairness in explanation
Crimes.Omission_Type: Failure to explain link between evidence and conclusion
Crimes.Grounds_for_Inadmissibility: Not formally inadmissible; refusal based on non-compliance with application requirements

Crimes.Crime_Name: Work Permit Refusal under Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations
Crimes.Legal_Issue: Reasonableness of visa officer’s decision and adequacy of justification
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Officer questioned credibility due to inconsistent employment records
Crimes.Evidence_Type: Employment certificates, workplace identification, professional experience documentation
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Insufficient evidence of professional experience and inconsistencies in documentation
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Lack of clarity in officer’s reasoning despite identified discrepancies
Crimes.Application_Error: Failure to clearly articulate how evidence led to adverse credibility finding
Crimes.Evidence_Ignored: No explicit discussion of how contradictions undermined applicant's suitability
Crimes.Application_Factor: Contradictory employment certificates and missing workplace details
Crimes.Decision_Review_Issue: Sufficiency and logic of the decision’s rationale
Crimes.Outcome_of_Review: Judicial review granted; case remanded to another officer
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Inadequate reasoning by visa officer regarding credibility and job suitability
Crimes.Evidentiary_Issues: Contradictory employment records, failure to identify past workplaces
Crimes.Procedural_Fairness: Compromised by unclear and incomplete reasoning
Crimes.Document_Fraud: Implied through alleged false or misleading statements in application
Crimes.Credibility_Issues: Raised due to inconsistencies in employment history
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Challenge based on unreasonableness and lack of justification
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Failure to provide transparent and logical decision-making process
Crimes.Omission_Type: Failure to connect factual findings to ultimate conclusion
Crimes.Grounds_for_Inadmissibility: Not found inadmissible; refusal based on failure to meet program requirements
